title: The President - President of The Republic - Official Information Site of the Presidency of the Portuguese Republic
snippet: Marcelo Rebelo de Sousa was elected President of the Republic for the first time on 24 January 2016 and took office on 9 March. He was re-elected for a second term on 24 January 2021 and took office on 9 March of the same year.
